name: hawaiian
content:
Hawaiian noun
(PERSON)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] someone from the US state of Hawaii: The party was thrown by a slightly eccentric Hawaiian. Obama says his wife is the best hula hooper he knows. And coming from a Hawaiian, that's a pretty big compliment.

Hawaiian noun
(LANGUAGE)
[ U ] a language spoken in Hawaii: The place is called Pihanakalani in Hawaiian. She learned Hawaiian at home with her parents.

belonging or relating to the US state of Hawaii or its people or language: Koa was Hawaiian and knew a lot about kukui nuts. Five restaurants in San Francisco serve Hawaiian food. "Mahalo" is the Hawaiian word for "thank you".
